about_the_company: A growing Medical Device company located in Parsippany, NJ.
job_responsibilities: Implementing embedded controllers using Microcontrollers for various image capture systems
Developing firmware utilizing C programming and Assembler
Working with capture schematics, PCB layout, routing, and tools like PADs
Collaborating with the manufacturing team to ensure thorough documentation and production of products
required_education: Bachelor's degree in Electrical or Electronics Engineering (or similar)
